document.text:
From: 
To 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Epstein 
Date: Fri, 09 Nov 2007 15:13:48 +0000 
Importance: Normal 
Attachments: 071109_Epstein_Article.pdf 
Hi sand MI: Here is an article from today's Palm Beach Post. I especially like the part about how the "feds 
were overreaching the whole time." 
Do you want to do a conference call some time this morning? I  have to leave for a sentencing at 12:30 and will 
be back in the office at around 3:00. 
Thank you. 
From 
Sent:WPM. 
9:34 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: FW: 
Epstein 
Let me know what you think
